Description:
Returns information about a patient's care team and care team members. The patient's care team includes longitudinal care team assignments as well as providers who have recent visits with the patient.

The patient's inpatient treatment team is not included in this resource. Inpatient treatment team members are instead included as participants in the relevant Encounter resource.

patient.Name: patient
patient.Optional: Either patient or subject must be provided.

status.Name: status
status.Description: CareTeam status. The only supported value is "active".

subject.Name: subject
subject.Optional: Either patient or subject must be provided.

Bundle.Name: Bundle
Bundle.Description: Resource bundle. For more information, refer to the FHIR specification.

participant.Name: participant
participant.Description:
A participant in the care team.

In scenarios where a provider on the care team has multiple specialties, this service will return one participant element for each unique combination of provider and specialty. For example if a provider is listed on the care team twice, once with a specialty of "Radiology" and once with a specialty of "Behavioral Health", there will be two participant elements returned by this resource. They will have the same member reference but will have different roles.

member.Name: member
member.Description: Reference to a care team member.

onBehalfOf.Name: onBehalfOf
onBehalfOf.Description:
Available starting in November 2021.

Reference to the last organization that updated an external care team member.
